Package com.aestus.api.profile.controller

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.aestus.api.profile.controller.ProfileController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/v1/profile") public class ProfileController extends Object
Provides the user profile controller functionality.

      Parameters:
      request - the http request
      Returns:

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/id/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'U\') or hasAuthority(\'S\') or hasAuthority(\'D\') or hasAuthority(\'I\') or hasAuthority(\'A\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> getById(@PathVariable Integer id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Gets user profile by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      request - the request
      Returns:

      Gets user profile by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      request - the request
      Returns:

    • getBadRequestResponse

      protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> getBadRequestResponse(org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, String uri)
      Checks for validation errors and returns the HTTP Bad Request with a compiled list of error messages if any.
      Parameters:
      result - the validation result
      uri - the uri
      Returns:
      the ResponseMessage instance containing all error messages with the HTTP Bad Request status.

    • create

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> create(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid UserProfile profile, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates a user profile.
      Parameters:
      profile - the user profile
      result - the validation result
      request - the request
      Returns:
      the ResponseMessage containing the user profile created with the auto-generated id

    • update

      @PutMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> update(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid UserProfile profile, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      Parameters:

    • remove

      @DeleteMapping("/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> remove(@PathVariable int id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Removes a user profile by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      request - the request
      Returns:
      HTTP status NOT FOUND if the user profile with id is not found. If the delete is successful, the HTTP status OK.

    • removeAll

      @DeleteMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> removeAll(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Removes all user profiles.
      Parameters:
      request - the request
      Returns:
      the HTTP status OK is successful
